learning_outcomes: Understand and use B1 Relationships and Family vocabulary
Apply B1 grammar structures in context

content.prompt_es: Une cada término con su definición correspondiente:

pairs.right: The legally or formally recognized union of two people
Each of two or more children having one or both parents in common
The state of being friends

content.prompt_es: Escribe la forma verbal o gramatical correcta (conjugación, plural, etc.):
content.stimulus_en: She (put up with) ________ his bad habits.

content.prompt_es: ¿Es gramaticalmente correcta la siguiente frase?: "Their friendship has lasted for over twenty years."
content.feedback_correct_es: ¡Correcto! Has detectado bien el error o la corrección.
content.feedback_incorrect_es: Revisa bien la estructura de los tiempos verbales B1.
